segments.text: The kitchen is such a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out of the sink, and the woman is just standing there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress is going to get soaked if she doesn’t move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and the boy is about to fall off that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t watch this anymore—it’s too stressful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman even knows the kids are behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is just chaotic and frustrating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just turn off the water already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is such a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR
